actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that the services of a gerontological nurse practitioner or gerontological clinical nurse specialist shall be covered under part B of medicare and shall be a required service under medicaid.

summary.text: Amends titles XVIII and XIX (Medicare and Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for gerontological nurse practitioner or gerontological clinical nurse specialist services under Medicaid and part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of Medicare.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that the services of a gerontological nurse practitioner or gerontological clinical nurse specialist shall be covered under part B of medicare and shall be a required service under medicaid.
